pages.text: A soul-bound javelin with two modes. Must be bound to a player using $(bold)Shift+Right-Click$(). When $(bold)activated$(), it costs 50LP per attack/throw but gains AOE attacks and sacrifices enemies to nearby altars. When $(bold)deactivated$(), it behaves like an unbreakable Diamond Pilum.

Created using an Alchemy Array. Right-click $(item)Arcane Ash$() on the ground to create the array, then right-click a $(item)Binding Reagent$() into it, followed by a $(item)Diamond Pilum$(). The weapon starts $(bold)unbound and deactivated$().

pages.title: Binding & Activation
pages.text: $(bold)Step 1 - Bind:$()$(br)Shift+Right-Click an unbound Bound Pilum to bind it to yourself.$(br2)$(bold)Step 2 - Activate:$()$(br)Shift+Right-Click again to toggle between deactivated and activated modes.$(br2)$(bold)Deactivated Mode:$()$(br)Functions as an unbreakable Diamond Pilum. No LP cost, no special abilities.$(br2)$(bold)Activated Mode:$()$(br)Costs 50LP per attack or throw. Gains AOE and sacrifice abilities!

pages.title: Activated Abilities
pages.text: When $(bold)activated$(), the Bound Pilum gains special powers:$(br2)$(bold)AOE Attacks:$()$(br)Both melee and thrown attacks deal damage in a 5-block radius.$(br2)$(bold)Altar Sacrifice:$()$(br)When near a Blood Altar, enemies hit by the AOE that are almost dead (below 0.5 health) will be $(bold)sacrificed to the altar$(), filling it with their life essence!$(br2)$(italic)Turn every battle into a blood ritual.$()
